statements: SELECT * FROM LeadScoring
SELECT lead_id, lead_name, lead_score FROM LeadScoring ORDER BY lead_score DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_leads FROM LeadScoring
SELECT AVG(lead_score) AS avg_lead_score FROM LeadScoring
SELECT lead_name FROM LeadScoring WHERE lead_score > 80
SELECT * FROM LeadScoring WHERE industry = 'Finance' AND lead_score > 80 ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM LeadScoring WHERE lead_source IN ('LinkedIn','Website')
SELECT * FROM LeadScoring WHERE lead_score BETWEEN 50 AND 70 AND industry = 'Technology' ORDER BY lead_score ASC, created_at DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_leads FROM LeadScoring WHERE lead_status = 'Qualified'
SELECT DISTINCT industry FROM LeadScoring
SELECT * FROM leads;
SELECT lead_id, lead_name FROM leads WHERE lead_score > 50;
SELECT rule_id, rule_name, scoring_criteria FROM lead_scoring_rules WHERE weightage >= 0.5;
SELECT * FROM lead_scoring_rules ORDER BY rule_name DESC;
SELECT lead_name, lead_score FROM leads WHERE lead_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM leads WHERE lead_id = 1;
SELECT lead_name, lead_score FROM leads WHERE lead_score > 70;
SELECT rule_name, scoring_criteria FROM lead_scoring_rules WHERE weightage > 0.5;
SELECT lead_name, lead_score FROM leads ORDER BY lead_score DESC;
SELECT rule_name, scoring_criteria, weightage FROM lead_scoring_rules WHERE rule_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM lead_scoring WHERE lead_score > 50;
SELECT lead_name, lead_source FROM lead_scoring ORDER BY lead_name ASC;
SELECT lead_id, lead_email FROM lead_details WHERE lead_company = 'ABC Corp';
SELECT * FROM lead_history WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT lead_id, event_name, event_date FROM lead_history ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT lead_name, lead_score FROM lead_scoring ORDER BY lead_score DESC;
SELECT lead_id, lead_email, lead_company FROM lead_details WHERE lead_company = 'ABC Corp';
SELECT lead_id, event_name, event_date FROM lead_history ORDER BY event_date ASC;
SELECT lead_id, lead_name, lead_score, lead_source FROM lead_scoring JOIN lead_details ON lead_scoring.lead_id = lead_details.lead_id;
SELECT DISTINCT lead_company FROM lead_details WHERE lead_phone IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM lead;
SELECT lead_name, lead_email FROM lead WHERE lead_score > 50;
SELECT lead_name, lead_email, lead_score FROM lead ORDER BY lead_score DESC;
SELECT lead_name, lead_email, lead_score FROM lead WHERE lead_email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT lead_name, lead_score FROM lead WHERE lead_score BETWEEN 30 AND 70 ORDER BY lead_name ASC;
SELECT lead_name, lead_email FROM lead ORDER BY lead_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM lead_interaction WHERE interaction_type = 'Email' AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM interaction_date) = 2021;
SELECT lead_name, rule_name, rule_score FROM lead, lead_scoring_rules WHERE lead.lead_score > lead_scoring_rules.rule_score;
SELECT lead_name, priority_level FROM lead JOIN lead_priority ON lead.lead_id = lead_priority.lead_id WHERE priority_level = 'High' ORDER BY lead_name ASC;
SELECT AVG(lead_score) as average_score FROM lead;
SELECT * FROM Leads;
SELECT lead_name, lead_email FROM Leads ORDER BY lead_name DESC;
SELECT lead_name, lead_score FROM Leads WHERE lead_score > 80;
SELECT SUM(lead_score) AS total_score FROM Leads;
SELECT lead_name, lead_email, activity_type FROM Leads JOIN LeadActivities ON Leads.lead_id = LeadActivities.lead_id;
SELECT lead_name, lead_email FROM Leads WHERE lead_score > 80;
SELECT * FROM LeadActivities WHERE activity_type = 'Email' ORDER BY activity_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT lead_name, lead_email FROM Leads JOIN LeadScores ON Leads.lead_id = LeadScores.lead_id WHERE LeadScores.lead_score < 60;
SELECT salesperson_name, COUNT(*) AS total_leads FROM SalesTeam JOIN Leads ON SalesTeam.salesperson_id = Leads.lead_id GROUP BY salesperson_name;

SELECT lead_name, SUM(weight) AS total_weight FROM Leads JOIN LeadActivities ON Leads.lead_id = LeadActivities.lead_id JOIN LeadScoreWeights ON LeadActivities.activity_type = LeadScoreWeights.activity_type;
